name: Zombian
description:
Dear Users,
This app is made to entertain it's users by letting the Zombie(You) to ZOMBIFY the Cats that are behind some barriers of wood. This is excellent for the users to master their assessing skills & increasing their concentration. We have made this app also to let users master their skills as to hitting where would point out at what.

Play this game & enjoy!

Thank You and I hope you liked the App, Please hit the ratings button to share your excitement with other Apple Folks!
